title: Bug 15899 - Close all saved does not work all the time
description: When using build 20020508 with the latest UI code, the 'Close All Saved' feature does not always work as expected. When following the steps to reproduce, selecting 'Close All Saved' from the file menu does not close all the open editors as intended.
OB: When using build 20020508 with the latest UI code, after creating a new file f1.txt and selecting 'Close All Saved' from the file menu, nothing happens.
EB: When using build 20020508 with the latest UI code, after creating a new file f1.txt and selecting 'Close All Saved' from the file menu, all the open editors should close.
SR: To reproduce the issue: 1. Use build 20020508 with the latest UI code. 2. Close all editors. 3. Create a new file f1.txt. 4. Select 'Close All Saved' from the file menu.
